item.title: Scons - Introduction
item.description: Purpose SCons is a tool equivalent to Makefile (but better). It is configured by simple Python code. From the authors: SCons is an Open Source software construction toolâ€”that is, a next-generation build tool. Think of SCons as an improved, cross-platform substitute for the classic Make utility with integrated functionality similar to autoconf/automake nd compiler caches such as ccache. In short, SCons is an easier, more reliable and faster way to build software.
